page.title: 03CUSTOMS
page.content: In the village there is a summer celebration called the {Revel.}It unvalves country dancing by the children and the crowning of a Revel Queen.The Revel started in eleven hundred and ninety and continued for many years and finally stopped. It was {restarted} in nineteen hundred and seventy eight after the twenty fifth Jubilee of Queen Elizabeth the second.The Revel has changed through the years. Some times there are majorettes,Morris men, skittles and Archery."There use to be a {flower {show }in Lapford until 1940.Everyone always ate Duck and green peas .The water in the church font always comes from the holy well in Mr. Poole's field at Eastington.There used to be a Strawberry tea in summer.
